data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "Think about something that you have made with your own hands (such as a cake, a piece of furniture, or a painting). Describe the experience and the results of your work. Include specific details."
data.answer: The first piece of furniture I made by myself was a dining table made from solid walnut. I did not get the chosen hardwood for our woodshop in school because local suppliers donated their seconds to us. Thus, I was stuck with the pieces we had available. The color varied from plank to plank on the top, which embodied their natural styles. After finishing my first piece of furniture,  I gave this dining table to my mother, who was a fan of collecting dining tables, as her birthday gift. All in all, this was something that I had made with my own hands when I was 20 years old.  (110)
